name: Squat
description: A fundamental compound lower body exercise targeting quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Deadlift
description: A key compound lift working the posterior chain including hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.

name: Push-Up
description: A classic upper body bodyweight exercise targeting chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Pull-Up
description: A challenging bodyweight exercise focusing on upper back and biceps.

name: Overhead Press
description: A compound upper body press focusing on shoulders and triceps.

name: Plank
description: Core strengthening isometric hold targeting abdominals and stabilizers.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral lower body exercise working quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Burpees
description: A high intensity full body movement combining squat, jump, and push-up.

name: Bicep Curl
description: Isolation exercise targeting the biceps with dumbbells or barbell.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Dynamic core and cardio movement performed in plank position.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: Explosive hip hinge movement for power and conditioning.

name: Jump Rope
description: Classic cardio exercise improving coordination and endurance.

name: Bench Press
description: A staple compound exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Russian Twist
description: Rotational core exercise focusing on obliques.

name: Box Jump
description: Explosive plyometric jump onto a raised platform to develop power.
